Hi there üëã! I‚Äôm a senior undergraduate Computer Science and Engineering student at PES University, Bangalore. I learn to play the South-Indian instrument Saraswathi Veena in the Carnatic style.
My research interests lie in machine learning and related fields. I have worked on projects in the domains of data analytics, graph machine learning, semi-supervised learning, NLP and Music Information Retrieval. I also have experience interning at Apple, Goldman Sachs, Netradyne, and Vogo. My work has ranged from software engineering and backend engineering to NLP and data engineering. You can find my detailed CV here.
I enjoy making concise, pictorial and aesthetically-pleasing lecture notes that my peers at college have been using to study since my first year (~38,000+ hits to the link). This really helped my juniors and peers during the pandemic as it was very difficult for everyone to keep up with all the online classes during such difficult times.
I‚Äôm looking for an opportunity where I can utilize my proven academic and creative capabilities along with my previous internship experience to contribute to exciting projects!

title: vibha masti
text:
News

2023

[01/09] I started my 6-month spring internship/co-op at Apple! I am so excited for this experience and unbelievably grateful.



2022

[12/04] I volunteered for the ISMIR 2022 conference in Bangalore, India from 4th to 9th December 2022.
[09/19] I attended the ECML-PKDD 2022 conference in Grenoble, France from 19th to 23rd September with my teammates to present at the MLG workshop. I made a vlog about it here.
[07/01] I traveled to Mumbai with my teammates to attend the IEEE TENSYMP conference and present our paper. I made a YouTube video about the experience here!
[06/06] I started my summer internship at Goldman Sachs.
[06/03] Made my first ever vlog! It‚Äôs about my 6th semester of college which was (finally) in-person!
